description: Big Slide (4240 pt; 27th) is one of the 46 peaks in the Adirondacks. One possible route to this peak (GPS track provided) leaves from the Garden parking lot, takes the trail to the Three Brothers, then on to Big Slide, then returns to the Garden via John Brook Lodge and the trail along the creek. It is described in High Peaks Region guide as "a spectacular approach". Total ascent from the Garden is 2800 ft.
directions: One access point to the trail to Big Slide is at the Garden, a parking area accessible from Keene Valley (parking is limited: arrive early or use the shuttle from Keene Valley).
title: Big Slide Mountain
